attributes.action: scrap plans for the 3 strikes legislation against filesharers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There has been a paper produced for the government stating that people that share copyrighted material will have three strikes against them before they are taken of the net.
I belive the way in which the Government plans to implement the new regulations could infringe on peoples freedom of speech.
If you agree with me please sign the petition.

rejection.details: There are no plans to implement such a policy.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
